trueStatements.description: A list of true statements for the question. Each is an HTML string.

falseStatements.description: A list of false statements for the question. Each is an HTML string.

correctScore.description: The score given for each correct response.

incorrectScore.description: The score given for each incorrect response. This is applied to both no-answers and answered questions.

guessingPenalty.description: Additional penalty assessed for each incorrect response. This is applied to only answered questions.
